p: Contributing to this debate, there was an 11.5% presence of the Y549H substitution in dogs from Brazil. In addition, all the dogs presented 530G and 580R, the latter representing 89% of the circulating strains ( Table 2). The authors suggest that this trend may be associated with the condition of the “stray” dogs that were sampled, who are more likely to have contact with wildlife acting like reservoirs in these ecosystems [ 126].
